explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques for portfolio optimization and return prediction.
explanations.deep learning: The paper integrates deep learning methods, specifically a hybridized deep learning method named Deep Belief-Recurrent Neural Network (DBRNN).
explanations.neural network: The paper involves neural networks, particularly recurrent neural networks (RNN) and deep belief networks (DBN).
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper uses RNN as part of the hybridized deep learning method for return prediction.
explanations.deep belief network: The paper uses DBN as part of the hybridized deep learning method for return prediction.
explanations.representation learning: The paper involves deep learning methods which inherently perform representation learning to extract features from data.
